attributes.action: We want an inquiry into the lack of due process  used by CSC to remove a child
attributes.additional_details:
We want the removal of innocent children to stop. We want a legal duty of care to be upheld and not ignored to prevent accountability.
Crimes are being committed against us the public and it must stop. We want the law in this country upheld and the care act followed and human rights upheld
attributes.background: We demand that due process is followed and adequate support to be provided before escalation to CPs and PLOs, we also demand an uphold of a legal duty of care and legal accountability for all professionals that fail to adhere to the BASW code of ethics

rejection.details:
You could start a petition calling for specific changes to legislation governing when children can be taken into care. We can't publish a petition that makes accusations of illegal activity. 

You may wish to sign:

Investigate the use of the Children Act 1989 to take children into care: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/641658
